classification.label: UNSPSC Classification
classification.comment:
This should represent the broadest classification of your store. It will be used as the default classification if a product classification cannot be determined.
Search UNSPSC numbers.

uom.label: Unit of Measure (UOM)
uom.comment: This is your default unit of measure for an item sale, such as EA (Each).

punchout_enabled.label: Punchout Enabled
punchout_enabled.comment: Enable/Disable punchout access to website or store.

punchout_only.label: Punchout Only
punchout_only.comment: Require a punchout session to be active to view any site content.

punchout_only_url.label: Punchout Only Error Url
punchout_only_url.comment: CMS path to drop non-punchout session access.

punchout_only_allow.label: Punchout Only Pass Through
punchout_only_allow.comment:
Allow these modules, controllers, and actions to pass through punchout only.
Comma separate entries.
module,module/controller,module/controller/action

allow_demo.label: Allow Demo Session
allow_demo.comment: Allow to access through a demo session.

demo_session_id.label: Demo Session Id
demo_session_id.comment: Session ID to use with ?POID= to create demo session

secure_redirect.label: Secure Redirect
secure_redirect.comment: Always redirect punchout session to the secure url.

disable_modules.label: Disable Modules
disable_modules.comment: Comma separated. Disable these modules with an active punchout session.

session_type.label: Session Type
session_type.comment:
Controls session login behaviors.
Auto Customer Login creates or logs a customer in based on configuration defined group.
Discover Customer creates or logs a customer in base on parameters, requires additional gateway level configurations.

single_login_group.label: Default Login Group
single_login_group.comment:
The Group Name or ID to apply to new users when accessing this store.
(required with auto-login)

single_login_user.label: Default Login User
single_login_user.comment: If no unique user identifier is discovered, use this account to login to this account.

strict_inspect_behavior.label: Strict "Inspect" behavior
strict_inspect_behavior.comment: Enabling this will prevent changes to the cart on "inspect". This is currently only enforced to the standard cart. Custom event observers may be required to prevent edit with custom cart options.

transfer_delete_cart.label: Delete cart on transfer
transfer_delete_cart.comment: Deleting the cart will cause edits to operate from the stash. Keeping the cart will allow edit to "reload" previous cart in their entirety.

customer.label: Customer Settings
customer.comment: Settings for controlling users setups and behaviors

attach_shipping.label: Attach Shipping
attach_shipping.comment: Attach shipping address to the session.

defaults.label: Default User Info (Pre-Insert)
defaults.comment:
Setup any predefined customer data when an automated user is created.
Use the following syntact to use fixed values, user data and request values.
email : will add the string "val" in to the field
$email$ : will copy the user value for "var" in to the field.
{body/conctact/email} : will copy the value from he original request

defaults_custom.label: Custom User Info (Post-Insert)
defaults_custom.comment:
Some custom user data is not available until after the account is created.
Utilize this group to set any additional customer fields.

create_users.label: Create New Users
create_users.comment: When enabled, if a user punches out and his/her email isn't already associated with a Magento customer account, creates a new customer account.

alternate_login_id.label: Alternate Login ID
alternate_login_id.comment:
By default customers are matched by their emails.
Specify an alternate customer attribute to authenticate people by. When using this featrue, the email by itself is nolonger treated as a login identifier.
The alternate login must be mapped to the "unique" contact attribute in the request.

duplicate_email_temp_pattern.label: Email Pattern on Duplicate
duplicate_email_temp_pattern.comment:
When matching on aliases, the email is still required to be unique.
If a matching email is detected use this pattern to establish a unique temporary email.
Leave blank to throw an error.

error_mapping.label: Error Mapping
error_mapping.comment:
Map error codes to custom CMS pages. Leave empty for default error display. Errors can be grep patters such as "4\d\d"
\d\d\d : will match all errors.

show_return.label: Show "Return To" Link
show_return.comment: Display a link that returns the user to the procurement system.

return_url.label: "Return To" Link URL
return_url.comment: Full URL Path, or leave empty to use Return Path from request.

return_target.label: "Return To" Link Target
return_target.comment: Specify link target or empty empty to ignore

checkout_nav.label: Show "Checkout" Top Nav
checkout_nav.comment: Show or hide the "Checkout" nav in top menu.

punchout_active_layout_update.label: Active Session Layout Update
punchout_active_layout_update.comment: When a punchout session is active, apply this layout update.

transfer_button_location.label: "Transfer" Button Location
transfer_button_location.comment: Personal checkout will also use this location.

transfer_button.label: "Transfer" Button Label
transfer_button.comment: The label on the button clicked to return the cart to the procurement system.

transfer_text.label: "Transfer" Help Text
transfer_text.comment: Help text provided with transfer button.

personal_checkout.label: Personal Checkout
personal_checkout.comment: Allow customers to use a personal checkout.

punchout_cart_layout_update.label: Active Session Cart Layout Update
punchout_cart_layout_update.comment:
When a punchout session is active, and in the cart view,
apply this layout update.

order.label: Order Settings
order.comment: Settings for controlling order options. Some configurations may be required on the gateway.

lineitem_mapping.label: Line Item Map
lineitem_mapping.comment:
Add custom data mapping to be returned with an order.
item/var = pulls from the line item.
product/var = pulls from original product.
option/var = pulls line item option.

stash_item_list.label: Item Stash List
stash_item_list.comment:
Add custom data to the item level stash.
Options can be stashed as "option/code_name"

stash_order_list.label: Order Stash List
stash_order_list.comment: Add custom data to the order level stash.

category_unspsc.label: Category UNSPSC Field Name
category_unspsc.comment: Category field containing the UNSPSC classification

product_unspsc.label: Product UNSPSC Field Name
product_unspsc.comment: Product field containing the UNSPSC classification

product_uom.label: Prodcut UOM Field Name
product_uom.comment: Product field containing the Unit Of Measure

secure.label: Secure Host
secure.comment: Flag to use HTTP vs HTTPS requests when communicating with the host.
